name: Lo'Dahr Portal (Noha's Domain)
detail: Exit of the Black Jungle portal, must be entered there first.

name: Lo'Dahr Portal (Spearhead Forest)
detail: Portal in a tree stump, exit of Vayniklah's Domain portal.

name: Lo'Dahr Portal (Vayniklah's Domain)
detail: Within a mountain, exit of the Spearhead Forest portal.

name: Lo'Dahr Portal (Lai's Domain)
detail: On a mountain in Lai's Domain, exit of the Faehrcyle Portal.

name: Lo'Dahr Portal (Loe's Domain)
detail: At Loeturia, exit of the Merijool Portal.

name: Lo'Dahr Portal (Voynahla's Domain)
detail: Exit of the Nihmaj Swamp portal, must be entered there first.

name: Lo'Dahr Portal (In a green flowered field)
detail: Exit of the Burnt Palace portal, must be entered there first.
